node.doctext:
This is a collection of common janitorial "attributions".
Code tags

Code tags added by [Me]
Readmore tags

[href://?node_id=17558#readmore|Readmore] tags added by [Me]
Move a writeup

Moved from [xxx] to [yyy] by [Me]
Unconsider a failed reap

Considered by {copy and paste considerer and reason from approval nodelet}
Unconsidered by [Me]: keep (and edit) votes [id://409197|prevented] reaping; {copy and paste votes from approval nodelet}

Reparenting replies of a reaped duplicate post

Node (and replies) reparented from duplicate thread [id://] by [Me]

Remove pre tags

Edit by [Me] - replaced pre tags with [href://?node_id=17558#codetags|code] tags, to prevent distortion of site layout and allow code extraction.
P tags

<P> tags added by [Me] to improve readability
See also
  • [Janitors' Guidelines]
  • [Writeup Formatting Tips]
node.title: Janitor Signatures
